project_descr: BRA/17/G31 - PIMS-5896 - Taking Deforestation out of Soy Supply Chain in MATOPIBA region.

outputs.output_descr: The project objective is to reduce deforestation in the agricultural frontier and to promote sustainable soy production in 6,000,000 ha of the MATOPIBA region.
